segments.text: I'm surprised by how calm everything seems, despite the chaos in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, while water overflows and kids climb on stools.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little bubble, unaware of the world around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the puddle at her feet or the kids behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to tipping that stool, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going through her mind, making her so oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, so trusting and sure of her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how kids can be so focused on what they want, even when there's danger around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay, but I'm not sure how much longer this calm can last.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where you just hold your breath and wait for something to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
